channel.title: Groove Sessions with DJ Diva Dee
channel.description:
DJ Diva Dee's Groove Sessions
*Mature and Sophisticated Soiree* – An exclusive mix of old and new school R&B, Hip Hop, Rap, Funk, Soul, Disco and Dirty South:
*Neo Soul Sanctuary –Neo/Nu Soul: Passages*- An amazing collection of Neo-Nu soul from mainstream and independent artist alike.
*Rhum Punch Beach Party - Bashes*- A spicey blend of Soca, Dancehall, Reggae, Calypso and Reggaeton
*Romance Remix - Acts* - A sweet mix of Slow n Sexy music mixxed and served up to everyone and anyone who is in the mood or wants to set the mood for love, romance and intimacy.
channel.itunes:author: DJ Diva Dee
channel.itunes:summary:
DJ Diva Dee's Groove Sessions
*Mature and Sophisticated Soiree* – An exclusive mix of old and new school R&B, Hip Hop, Rap, Funk, Soul, Disco and Dirty South:
*Neo Soul Sanctuary –Neo/Nu Soul: Passages*- An amazing collection of Neo-Nu soul from mainstream and independent artist alike.
*Rhum Punch Beach Party - Bashes*- A spicey blend of Soca, Dancehall, Reggae, Calypso and Reggaeton
*Romance Remix - Acts* - A sweet mix of Slow n Sexy music mixxed and served up to everyone and anyone who is in the mood or wants to set the mood for love, romance and intimacy.

item.title: Donna Summer: Diva of the Disco MasterMix
item.description:
DJ Diva Dee's Music Notes:

Donna Summer (12-31-48 - 5-17-2012)

There is so much to be said about this amazing artist that I will simply leave you with links to read about the Queen of Disco and the legend and music she left for us to enjoy!

hmm.. well except for this short piece of info: The Library of Congress said on Wednesday (May 23, 2012) that it was adding Ms. Summer’s “I Feel Love” to its National Recording Registry" as reported by The New York Times.

...and now the links

www.donnasummer.com
www.donna-tribute.com
www.youtube.com/artist/donna_summer
www.facebook.com/DonnaSummer
www.BrooklynSudano.com (Read the bio)

* On The Radio LIVE!   Donna Summer
* (If It) Hurts Just a Little   Kharrington Fairweather
* Bad Girls   Donna Summer
* Bad Girls REMIX   Jeff Star
* Funky Town   Donna Summer
* Heaven Knows   Donna Summer
* Hot Stuff   Donna Summer
* Hot Stuff REMIX   Donna Summer
* I Feel Love REMIX   Roger Gangi
* I Feel Love REMIX   Dashi Dance
* No More Tears (Enough is Enough)   Donna Summer
* She Works Hard For The Money   Donna Summer
* Dim All The Lights   Donna Summer
* Coult It Be Magic (Extended)   Donna Summer
* Love to Love You Baby   Donna Summer
* Last Dance   Donna Summer

item.title: Romance Remix Act 4: For Steve and Linea
item.description:
DJ Diva Dee Music Notes:
Stevie Wonder was born Stevland Hardaway Judkins in Saginaw Michigan. He plays the synthesizer, piano, keyboards, harmonica, clavinet, drums, bass guitar, congas, bongos, melodica, keytar and accordion. There isn't enough space here to document the "wonders" of Stevie but it's quite obvious to everyone with ears that this man is simply an amazing talent!

Frank McComb has been compared to Donny Hathaway and Stevie Wonder. He was also an orginal member of Branford Marsalis’band “Buckshot LeFonque”. Frank started his his production company, Boobeescoot Music and has released his third album “Straight from the Vault”. The “Wedding Song” in this playlist is from Frank’s “Love Stories” CD.

* Ribbon In The Sky     Stevie Wonder
* Wedding Song   Frank Mc Comb
* I Belong To You   Rome
* Every Time I Close My Eyes   Babyface
* Spend My Life   Eric Benet and Tamia
* All My Life   KC and JoJo
* You and I   O'Bryan
* On Bended Knee   Boyz II Men
* Here and Now   Luther Vandross
* If Only You Knew   Patti LaBelle
* Love's Holiday   Earth, Wind and Fire
* You Give Good Love   Whitney Houston
* Cherish The Day   Sade
* Feenin   Jodeci
* Love All Over Me   Monica
* I Love You   Faith Evans
* Computer Love   Zapp

item.title: The Mature & Sophisticated Soiree-3 Keep It Movin'
item.description:
DJ Diva Dee's Music Notes:

Missy Ellioit is one of my favorite MC/Producer/Songwriters! I adore and applaud her ability to always think outside of the box. She's a thinker, creater, innovator and so much more. This is a FACT, not an opinion. Proof? Grammy Awards: 2006 Best Short Form Video,2004 Best Female Rap Solo Performance, 2003 Best Female Rap Solo Performace, 2002 Best Rap Solo Performace, 2002 Best Pop Collaboration with Vocals AND 16 Grammy Award nominations.
But wait..there's more. MTV Video Music Awards: 2006 Best Special Effects in a Video, 2005 Best Hip-Hop Video, 2005 Best Dance Videoi, 2003 Video of the Year, 2003 Best Hip-Hop Video, 2001 Video of the Year, 2001 Best Video from a Film AND 29 MTV Video Music Award nominations. and MORE:American Music Awards, 2003 and 2005 Favorite Female Rap/Hip-Hop Artist and 1 American Music Award nomination. BET Awards: 2008&2006 Best Femal Hip-hop Artist, 2005 Best Collarboration, 2004, 2003 & 2002 Best Femal Hip-Hop Artist AND 10 BET Award nominations.

Missy has also earned awards from the following awards organizations:

BET Hip Hop Awards, Soul Train Music Awards, Soul Train Lady of Soul Awards and Vibe Awards.

* OMG   Usher
* Centipeded   Ying Yang Twinz
* Pass That Dutch   Missy Elliot
* Run The World (Girls)   Beyonce
* Caught up   Usher
* Touch   Omarion
* How Could You   Mario
* Venus vs. Mars   Jay-Z
* Hello Good Morning   Dirty Money Ft. Diddy, Rick Ross, Niki Minaj
* Just A Lil Bit   50 Cent
* Conceited   Remy Ma
* Snake   R. Kelly
* Baby Boy   Beyonce Ft. J Sean,DJ Finese
* Flashlight   George Clinton Ft. Parliment
* Dazz   Brick
* Try my Loving (Gimmie Just Enough)   Kiddo
* Weak At The Knees   Steve Arrington
* Feels So Real (Won't Let Go)   Patrice Rushen
* Rock With You   Michael Jackson

item.title: Neo Soul Sancutary-2 Soul Soother
item.description:
DJ Diva Dee's Music Notes:

I fell in love with "Need To Know" (by Duocity) immediately. The melody hooked me from the start and as I proceeded to take in the words, they proved themselves the perfect match to the melody.

Duocity is a soulful Scorpion union of true talent. Claudia M. Melton is a Musician/Singer/Songwriter/Pianist/Producer and the Producer and Host of HOB Underground and D Maurice - D'Mo Macklin (currently on tour and singing with Eric Roberson)

Also hailing from Texas is another talented SoulStar, N'Dambi. Former backup singer for Eryka Badu, N'Dambi stepped into her solo career and has not looked back since. Independantly she released three awesome albums, "Little Lost Girls Blues", "Tunin' Up & CoSignin" and "A Weird Kinda Wonderful. Eventually she signed with Stax Records where she released her Grammy nominated ablum, "Pink Elephant" in 2009. Visit www.ndambionline.com for additional information.

* Need To Know   Duocity
* Picture This/Can This Be Love   N'Dambi
* Listen To Your Heart   Frank McComb
* Stay With You   John Legend
* So Gone(What My Mind Says)   Jill Scott Ft. Paul Wall
* Mirror   KeKe Wyatt Ft. Kelly Price and Tweet)
* I'm A Mess   Anthony Hamilton
* Contentment   Kindred The Family Soul
* Heaven   Conya Doss
* Womanopoly   Musiq
* Make Love   Angie Stone duet with Musiq Soulchild
* Epiphany   Chrisette Michelle
* Lady   D'Angelo
* Purify Me   India.Arie
* Wishful Thinking   Vivian Green
* Back In The Day   Eryka Badu

item.title: Rhum Punch Beach Party- Fiesta 2 Kyle's Jamz
item.description:
DJ Diva Dee's Music Notes:

Benjai (Rodney Le Blanc) earned the 2011 Calypso Of The Year Award for the composition of "Trini". The Top 20 Calypso Stars of Gold and Calypso of the Year awards ceremony was stated at the National Academy for the Performing Arts (NAPA) on Frederick Street, Port-of-Spain. The awards represent the pinnacle of achievement for excellence in calypso composition.

Machel Montano is the frontman of the soca band Xtatik. The band has since been renamed to "Machel montano HD (High Definition). He is part of a huge campaign in Trinidad and Tobago promoting safe driving- Arrive Alive. Machel 's "Bumper To Fender " was a Trinidad Carnival 2010 favorite.

* Bumper To Fender   Machel Montano
* Body Sway   Zoelah
* Scrunter 21   Scrunter
* De Riddim   Lyrikal
* It Don't Matter   Beenie Man, Terry Felicia & Bandy Leggz
* Gimmie More   Crazy
* Trini   Benjai
* Gal Ah Rush Me   Becket
* If It's Loving' That You Want   Rihanna
* Wild 2 Nite   Shaggy
* Faded   Sean Paul
* Di Position   Mr. Vegas
* Body Good   Spragga Benz
* Behold   Terror Squad
* Slam   Beenie Man
* Under Pressure   Super Cat
